No. CAS-7(2)/98-DIV-1
GOVERNMENT OF INDIAN
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY
*A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN,
NEW DELHI — 110001.

Dated : 11.02.2004

CIRCULAR NO. 5/ 2004.

SUB: ACCESS OF VEHICLE UETO. THE TARMAC AREA OF THE CIVIL
AIRPOR’

In continuation to this Bureau Circular No. 24/2002 dated 06.09.2002 on the
subject cited above the following instructions are issued.

1. Facility of taking personal vehicle upto the tarmac at the civil airports in
the country be given to Jagatguru. Shankaracharya of Kanchi Peetam for
a period of six months on health ground.

2. Facility of taking vehicle upto the tarmac in Delhi and J&K may be given
to Dr. Faroog Abdullah, former CM, J&K on security ground,

‘The above instructions shall be strictly complied with by all concerned with
immediate effect.

Addl. Commissioner of Security ‘|

Distribution as per list attached.

(ete)
